|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Atheros;AR8033; |eth3chip = Atheros;AR8033; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:04:9F |oui = C8:FF:28
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2017.07; |stockos = Linux;4.9.62;Ubuntu 16.04;
|exp_if_types = SD/SDHC/MMC card, USB 3.0, M.2 (NGFF), MikroBus, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = 1 |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->

|serial = yes,, USB Female (Micro-B),, console,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 10-pin header,, populated,, J9
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, Audio out (3.5mm), Audio in (3.5mm), heatsink |addchip = Full-Speed USB Mixed Signal Integration Microcontroller;NXP;MK20FN1M0V;;1;,,, Low Power Stereo Codec;Freescale Semiconductor;SGTL5000;;1;,,, USB PD & type C Current-Limited Power Switch;NXP;NX5P3090;;1;,,, Single UART w/I2C bus/SPI Interface;NXP;SC16IS740;;1;,,, Multi-Output DC/DC Regulator;NXP;MC34VR5100;;1;,,, 5A, 1.0 MHz Single Switch-Mode Power Supply;NXP;MC34713EP;;1;,,, Single 1.2A USB Switch;Analog Devices;MAX8586;;1;,,, Dual Supply Translating Transceiver w/Auto Direction Sensing;NXP;NTSX2102;;1;,,, Dual-Input Single-Outpu Advanced Power Switch;ON Semi;FPF1321UCX;;1;,,, PCI Express 2-Output Clock Generator;Skyworks;Si52112-B5;;1;, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/2018 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Qualcomm Atheros QCNFA435 |rad1modif = M.2 (NGFF) |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9377; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 433 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 150/150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[NXP]]'' LS1012A @1.0GHz :Single-core ARM (Cortex-A53) *Memory: 512MB (DDR3L) SDRAM *Storage: 16MB (NOR) 128MB NAND (QSPI) Flash, :SD/SDHC/MMC card (max.32GB) slot *USB: 1x USB 3.0 OTG port *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet *Expansion: 1x mikroBUS Click connector *Power Source: DC Jack 5V, 4A
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/nxp/nxp_frwy-ls1012a |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = layerscape |subtarget = armv8_64b |arch = aarch64_generic |support_started_version = 19.07.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.4 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
